WorkItem.ClosedComment: It's very difficult to actually design this in way that works correctly in both AMD and CommonJS. We're certainly aware that it would be useful, but haven't come up with a satisfactory solution in time for v1.0.
WorkItem.Description: Is there any good reason for this limitation? It would make life easier in many situations...
WorkItem.Summary: error TS5010: Cannot compile dynamic modules when emitting into single file
